term.title: pharmacokinetics

item.text: Process of the uptake of drugs by the body, the biotransformation they undergo, the distribution of the drugs and their metabolites in the tissues, and the elimination of the drugs and their metabolites from the body over a period of time.

term.sources: 'Glossary of terms used in toxicokinetics (IUPAC Recommendations 2003)' Nordberg, M.;Duffus, J.;Templeton, D.M.; Pure and Applied Chemistry 2004 76(5) 1033
